sourcesContent:
import { useState,useEffect } from "react" import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; export default function ProductDetails(){ const[product,setProduct]=useState(null); const {id}= useParams(); useEffect(() => { fetch(`${process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL}/products/${id}`) .then(res => res.json()) .then(res => { console.log('API Response:', res); setProduct(res.product); // Update this based on actual response structure }) .catch(err => console.error('Fetch Error:', err)); }, [id]); return
